New release
  CMP v{{ release }}

    NEW FEATURES
  •  •BIDS friendly
  •  •Preprocessing: eddy_openmp current correction, Dipy/MRtrix3 dwi denoising, FAST/N4 bias field correction
  •  •Segmentation: BET / ANTs brain extraction during Freesurfer RECON-ALL , MRtrix3 5TT (5-class tissue probability) segmentation
  •  •New parcellation scheme: 5-scale Lausanne2018 (with hippocampal subfields, thalamic nuclei, brainstem structures)
  •  •Registration: ANTs SyN
  •  •New reconstuction schemes: Dipy SHORE, Dipy CSD, MRtrix3 Tensor, MRtrix3 CSD
  •  •Diffusion microstructure: Dipy MAP-MRI
  •  •Deterministic and probabilistic Anatomically-Constrained Tractography (ACT): Dipy, MRtrix3
  •  •Resting-state MRI preprocessing: AFNI despiking, Quadratic detrending, AFNI bandpass filtering
    • REMOVED FEATURES
  •  •Reconstruction and tractography using Diffusion Toolkit
  •  •Probabilistic tractography: FSL probtrackx
  •  •Global tractography: Gibbs-tracker
    • IN THE NEAR FUTURE
  •  •Diffusion: Estimation of myelin map
  •  •Global tractography: COMMIT
